title: What is the interpretation of divorce in a dream for a married man according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Divorce in a dream for a married man: This dream has many meanings and connotations, some of which carry goodness and others serve as a signal or warning to the dreamer. The interpretation varies from person to person depending on the condition of the dreamer and according to the details of the vision. Divorce in a dream for a married man. If a man sees in a dream that he is divorcing his wife and indeed there are many disputes and problems between them, then this vision means that these problems will be resolved and the differences will end soon. Seeing divorce in a dream for a married man and in In reality, he loves her and does not want to leave her and move away from her. This vision means that something will happen that will make him very happy, and this may be something in social life or practice. Zoe. Interpretation of divorce in a dream by married Ibn Sirin. According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, if someone sees that he is divorcing his wife, this means that There are many disagreements and problems between them, but they will end soon. The interpretation of seeing a man divorcing his wife in a dream while he actually loves her means that he will suffer a great loss in his life in something that he desperately wanted to achieve, or this vision may also indicate that there will be disagreements between him. And from someone who is very close to him, he will remain for a long time. Divorce in a dream symbolizes the loss and differences that exist between a man and his wife, and it can also indicate that the dreamer will suffer from extreme poverty, and this vision can also indicate that there is something that the dreamer desires while he is there. He accepted it, but he cannot and does not have the ability to take it. You will find all the interpretations of Ibn Sirin’s dreams and visions on the Dream Interpretation website on the Internet from Google. The most important interpretations of divorce in a dream for a married man. Divorce of a woman in a dream. Seeing a woman’s divorce in a dream carries many interpretations, among which are many differences and problems between the husband. And instability in their lives. If a man sees in a dream that he is divorcing his wife and the wife is already suffering from a serious illness, this means that she will soon recover from her illness, God willing. This vision may also indicate that the husband will suffer a great financial loss that will cause him sadness and distress for a long time. Asking for a divorce in a dream If a man sees in a dream that his wife is asking him for a divorce, this means that he is neglecting her and neglecting her rights, and he must take care of her a little so as not to lose her. This vision can also indicate a change in situation and the situation can be, for example, that she will move to another job or another house in the coming period, when a married woman sees in her dream that she is asking for a divorce from him. Her husband, means that she wants to change many things in her life. If a person suffering from poverty sees in a dream that his wife is asking him for a divorce, this means that the poverty in which he lives will end and be replaced by prosperity and happiness. Contacting his wife in a dream after her divorce. Most jurists mentioned that if a man divorces His wife, then he saw in a dream that he was having intercourse with her. This indicates that he will suffer a great loss in which he will lose all his money, and then the dreamer will try. To make up for everything he lost, if a man sees this vision and in reality he is thinking about reconciling with his wife again, this is evidence

title: Interpretation of the vision of buying makeup in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a makeup market in a dream via the roy2a.com website, seeing buying makeup in a dream indicates wealth and wealth and the death of anxiety and worry and achieving happiness, and if its appearance is bad, this indicates a lack of self-confidence and an appearance contrary to the inside as well as makeup. An indication of the love of compliments, and in this article we will explain the interpretation of seeing the purchase of makeup in a dream for a single man and young man, as well as for married or divorced imams such as Imam Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and other contemporary artists, follow us on the Vision website. What is the interpretation of seeing the purchase of makeup in a dream for Imam Ibn Sirin? Seeing yourself buying makeup in a dream indicates self-confidence, luxury and well-being. Seeing in a dream that buying makeup tools at high prices indicates wealth, riches and renewing the dreamer's life. Seeing yourself wearing makeup on an exaggerated image of a woman in a dream indicates an interest in the external appearance rather than the internal. See also: Interpretation of seeing makeup tools in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing the purchase of makeup in a dream for a single woman? Seeing a girl buying makeup in a dream shows her love for compliments and good conversation with people. Seeing the purchase of makeup tools in a dream for a girl indicates her success in practical, social and emotional life and gaining many friendships. What is the interpretation of seeing the purchase of makeup in a dream for a married woman? Seeing the purchase of makeup in a dream for a married woman shows a love of appearing good in front of people and hiding her private life. Seeing the purchase of makeup in a dream For a married woman, it indicates good luck and happy news. If a married woman sees that she is putting large amounts of makeup on her face in a dream, this indicates tension and anxiety in her life, and her appearance is different from her nature. See also: Interpretation of seeing makeup in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing buying makeup in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing buying makeup in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates feelings of anxiety and fear of childbirth and its pains. If a pregnant woman sees that she is putting makeup on her face and that her appearance is beautiful, this indicates an easy birth and her happiness with the child. What is the interpretation of seeing buying makeup in a dream for a divorced woman? Seeing a divorced woman buying expensive makeup tools in a dream means wealth, wealth, and renewing her life for the better. Seeing makeup applied to her face in an amazing way and in large quantities in a dream indicates tension, pressure, and lack of self-confidence, as it may indicate her mistreatment of others. See also: Interpretation of seeing cosmetics in a dream What is the interpretation of dreaming about wiping makeup off for single women? Dreaming of removing makeup for unmarried women indicates the end of worries and problems and passing through difficult stages in their lives. Seeing removing makeup for unmarried women indicates that the girl will achieve what she wants and make the right decisions and win Financially. What is the interpretation of buying makeup in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a married woman buying makeup in a dream indicates the death of anxiety and worry and the death of psychological disorders. To see in a dream, buying a box

title: Interpretation of seeing green lemons in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing green lemons in a dream or dreams through the website Vision roy2a.com Seeing lemons in a dream has many meanings. The interpretation of a dream about lemons varies among interpreters, depending on the color of the lemon, whether it is yellow or green, and according to the dreamer’s condition and circumstances, and whether he is a single man or woman. Or married or pregnant, and today through the Vision website, we will discuss the interpretation of seeing green lemons in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of major translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Katheer, Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, follow that. We. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing green lemons in a dream? Seeing green lemons in a dream A good dream indicates the arrival of abundant goodness to the dreamer, unlike the dream of yellow lemons. Seeing green lemons in a dream It indicates a lot of sustenance and money that the dreamer will obtain. Seeing lemons Immature green in a dream indicates that the dreamer will face many difficulties and problems that will not be easily overcome. Seeing green lemons and tasting their taste in a dream indicates the fulfillment of desires and success in achieving goals. Seeing a lemon tree in a dream indicates that the fortuneteller has good morals, generosity and love. For people and seeks to help them. See also: Interpretation of seeing lemons in a dream What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing yourself eating green lemons in a dream? Seeing yourself eating green lemons in a dream indicates that the dreamer will achieve financial gains and great material gains. Seeing yourself eating green lemons in a dream may It indicates some problems that the viewer will face, but he will overcome them quickly. Seeing eating lemons in a dream about a sick person indicates that he has recovered from his illness, and God knows best. Seeing myself eating green lemons while the atmosphere was very sour indicates that the dreamer is going through a crisis and feels sad and upset. The dreamer seeing that someone is eating a lemon In a dream, it indicates that this person will accuse the fortuneteller and accuse him of a certain matter. See also: Interpretation of seeing green mint in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing green lemons in a dream for a man? Seeing green lemons in a dream shows that he will soon obtain a lot of money. Seeing green lemons in a dream indicates He is a pious person seeking to earn halal money. Seeing green lemons in a dream shows that he will achieve the goals he is trying to achieve. Seeing green lemons in a dream indicates excellence and success in scientific or professional life. See also: Interpretation of seeing a black, green, yellow, or white snake in a dream. Dream: What is the interpretation of seeing a green lemon in a dream for a single woman? Seeing one green lemon in a dream indicates that she is a girl with good morals and a pure heart and loves doing good. Seeing one green lemon in a dream shows that she will earn a lot of money in the near future. Seeing one green lemon in a dream indicates that she She will achieve her desires and goals that she aspires to. Seeing in a dream an unmarried woman picking lemons from trees announces that she will meet her hoped-for partner in life and bond with him soon. Seeing women alone

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a balcony in a dream

preview.html: A balcony in a dream indicates success and success in study or career. It also indicates good news and good planning for the future. Interpretation of dreams to see a balcony in a dream, or the balcony is the part of the house facing the street and has many different uses, but in a dream, interpretation of dreams is sure to sit on the balcony or stand on the balcony, in addition to this vision shows many different meanings and meanings that we will understand today. We will explain this in this article. Interpretation of a dream about a balcony by Ibn Sirin: As Ibn Sirin explained, seeing a balcony in a dream can herald success and luck. When you stand on the balcony, you can see the improvement in social conditions. If you see a balcony in a dream, this may also indicate selfishness. As for seeing a balcony collapsing in a dream, this may indicate an increase in disagreements, problems, and psychological problems. Seeing a balcony full of flowers symbolizes good news. See also: Dream interpretation of seeing a balcony in a dream according to Nabulsi. Interpretation Dreaming of a man on a balcony: See point BalconyIn a dream a man is seriously injured. Seeing a balcony in a dream also means the arrival of unfortunate news. As for seeing urine on the balcony in a dream, this indicates the arrival of nourishment. Seeing water on the balcony in a dream means that someone was troubled. Seeing a dreamer standing on a balcony in a dream means that the dreamer is waiting for important news. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing falling in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a balcony for a single woman: A vision on an unmarried girl’s balcony indicates that she is helping the needy and may indicate her fear of people’s intentions and efforts. As for seeing a Falling from the balcony, this indicates that there is a warning about a certain thing and a change in the course of her life so that she is not exposed to problems and troubles. Seeing an unmarried woman standing with a man she does not know on the balcony shows her strength in dealing with problems and problems. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing stairs in a dream For a single woman: Interpretation of a dream about a balcony for a married woman: Seeing a married woman opening a balcony in her dream means that she will get a new house or a new car. Interpretation of a dream about a balcony in a dream: Seeing a balcony in a dream means success and success in professional life. Seeing yourself standing on the balcony indicates an improvement in social status And economic for the viewer. Seeing the balcony collapsing indicates the difficulties faced by the dreamer, and it also indicates the presence of cunning and deceitful friends in the dreamer’s life. Seeing urinating on the balcony may indicate his coming to life. Seeing yourself standing on the balcony means that you are waiting for a wish to come true. It also indicates The upcoming future. Seeing water spilled on the balcony may indicate the presence of a person causing disturbances and intrigues.

title: Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the birth of a boy in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Scientists and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the website Vision roy2a.com. It indicates providing a lot of goodness and food, so we will talk about the interpretation of this vision through this article about the single girl, the married woman, the man, the single young man, the divorced woman, and the pregnant woman. What is the interpretation of seeing a boy in a dream about a single girl? Seeing a single girl Giving birth to a boy in a dream indicates that she will be blessed with many blessings, such as the beginning of a happy life or joining a prestigious job. Seeing a single girl giving birth to a handsome boy in a dream is an example of her relationship with a young man with high morals and extraordinary beauty. Seeing a single woman because she had an ugly boyfriend is a sign of her fiancé’s corrupt morals, stinginess, and hatred. Others have it. Seeing the birth of a dead child in a dream is a sign of her bad luck in life and brings her sadness and depression. See also: Interpretation of seeing the shape of a fetus in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a married woman giving birth to a son in a dream? Seeing a married woman giving birth to a son in a dream is an indication of the presence of marital disputes and problems that may It leads to separation from her husband. Seeing a married woman giving birth to a boy and giving birth to many other children is a sign that she is constantly thinking about the boy and getting pregnant again. Seeing a married woman having a handsome and fair son is a sign of her serious suffering from problems and worries that bring her sadness and anguish. Seeing a boy in a dream For a barren woman, there are auspicious visions that indicate that she will give birth easily and that she will overcome all the pains of pregnancy. See also: Interpretation of seeing urinating in a dream. What is the interpretation of a man who sees a child in a dream? Seeing a man giving birth to a boy in a dream is an indication of corruption of morals and God’s wrath upon him due to his many sins and the attempt to keep him away. On the path of corruption and bringing him closer to God Almighty. Seeing a poor man giving birth to a boy in a dream indicates his huge financial loss and the loss of all his wealth, and the occurrence of many positive changes in his life and his possession of enormous wealth. Seeing a married man carrying his wife and giving birth to a son indicates many changes in the dreamer’s life and the end of all his problems. Seeing a married man having a handsome son is an indication that you have a great treasure and huge money through inheritance or a will. See also: Interpretation of seeing a severed hand in a dream. What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman seeing a child in a dream? Seeing a pregnant woman giving birth to a boy in a dream and his death after giving birth is a sign of his suffering from Severe pain and problems during pregnancy. Seeing a pregnant woman giving birth to a boy is a sign that she feels fear and anxiety about the upcoming new birth. Seeing the birth of a boy in a dream shows that she is safe and enjoying the best health for herself and her fetus. Seeing a pregnant woman giving birth and facilitating her birth is an indication that you hear the good news and feel happiness and love. See also Interpretation of seeing a girl or boy without clothes in a dream: What is the interpretation of a young man who sees the birth of a boy in a dream? A young man seeing the birth of a boy in a dream indicates the beginning of a happy life full of joy and love with his life partner. Seeing a young man giving birth to a boy in a dream indicates his great sadness over problems and

title: Interpretation of a dream about colorful flowers

preview.html: Therefore, everyone who loves someone else buys him roses, and this also happens in a dream. Since flowers mean love and affection in reality, they also mean in reality, except for some simple visions that we will explain to you, so follow us. Interpretation of a dream about colorful flowers for single women. A single girl who sees colorful flowers in her dream. Evidence that he will receive a lot of good and happy news. And they will live A luxurious life in the future. As for the time when a girl sees that she is buying colorful flowers, it is evidence that she will get married soon. As for seeing red flowers, it is evidence that she will feel very happy. And that her marriage will be a happy marriage to a young man who loves her very much. title: Interpretation of bread in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: There are those who see bread in a dream, and this dream can have many connotations, it can bring good and it can be a harbinger of evil, and this varies according to the state of the dream and the nature of the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing bread in a dream for a married woman When a married woman sees herself offering bread to a dead man during her sleep. It can be an indication of the good that you can get. When a married woman sees in her dream that she is preparing bread or preparing it in a dream. This may be an indication that it is a good and good vision, and it may also be an indication that there is a livelihood that comes to her, God willing. When a married woman dreams that she is giving bread to a young child. It may be a good omen that there is a child described as good who will be born soon, God willing. If a married woman dreams that she is preparing bread and then presenting it to her husband to eat from it. This may be a sign that her husband loves her very much, and it also indicates his loyalty to her in life. You may be interested in: Making bread in a dream for unmarried, pregnant and divorced women Seeing fresh bread in a dream for a married woman When a married woman dreams of buying fresh bread for her children. Perhaps it is good news for the huge increase in the diet that may come to her in Soon, God willing. When a married woman sees fresh bread in her dream, it can be a sign of adequate nutrition, kindness and blessing. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is making bread herself and takes this bread out of the oven after it is cooked, it becomes beautiful and tastes delicious. This may be evidence of her support for her husband and standing by him, as it indicates her tremendous sustenance, God willing. If a married woman sees in her dream that the bread has become white. It may be an indication of an increase in kindness and sustenance for her in the near future. If a married woman sees bread in her dream, this generally indicates the stability of her marital life. It also shows her tendency towards problems and worries in her life. If a married woman sees that she is distributing fresh bread to neighbors and relatives. It may be a sign that he will recover soon. When a married woman sees in her dream that the bread is fresh but brown in color. It may be an indication that no food can be eaten at this time. But it carries evidence of the presence of goodness in the life of a married woman. When a married woman dreams that she brings bread to her husband and children. It shows that she can give birth, God willing. Giving bread in a dream For a married woman If a married woman sees in her dream that she is giving bread to her husband and he eats from it. Perhaps this is evidence of her husband’s great love for her. If a married woman dreams that she is giving bread to relatives or neighbors. It may be an indication that there is goodness and food on the way to her soon. When a married woman sees in her dream that she is offering bread and some food to a dead person in reality and eating from it. It can mean good luck and good fortune for her. Interpretation of a dream about eating warm bread for a married woman When a married woman sees in her dream that she is eating bread, this may mean that her married life is characterized by stability and

title: Interpretation of seeing roses in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Roses symbolize love, beauty, tranquility, peace and many other positive symbols, so many people wonder whether the appearance of roses in a dream carries the same positive meanings or does it carry negative meanings for males and females. Interpretation of a dream about seeing cement in a dream. Interpretation of seeing roses in a dream by Imam al-Sadiq Imam al-Sadiq says that the appearance of white roses in the dream of an unmarried young man may indicate marriage to a righteous girl who is characterized by good manners and morals. Giving roses between disputants in a dream indicates reconciliation between them and the end of the period of hostility between these disputants. Imam al-Sadiq believes that the yellow rose indicates that the dreamer will suffer from an illness in the coming period. As for the purple rose, it indicates the presence of some mysterious things and secrets in the dreamer's life during this period. Interpretation of a dream about a doctor in a dream for a single woman. A gift of roses in a dream Giving roses from the lover to the owner of the dream, the unmarried girl, indicates the approach of an official relationship with the lover in the coming period. As for a man giving roses to his wife in a dream, this indicates a delay in childbirth. The gift of a rose that a pregnant woman receives in her dream indicates The birth of the type of child that the dreamer had hoped for, whether male or female. Receiving roses from the work manager in a dream can be one of the signs that the dreamer will get a new promotion in this job. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a lawyer in a dream. Growing roses in a dream Planting roses in a dream indicates that the dreamer will participate in other charitable works or provide assistance and assistance to the needy. Planting roses in front of the door of the house in a dream indicates the good reputation and fragrant biography enjoyed by the people of that house. Ibn Sirin believes that planting roses in a dream can indicate the multiplicity of offspring that the dreamer will have. Planting roses in a dream in general indicates that the dreamer will do a charitable work or charity work in his life that benefits the dreamer and those around him. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a gold ring in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about pink roses Pink roses in a pregnant woman's dream indicate that this woman will give birth to a daughter. Roses can be pink in a single girl's dream, indicating that this girl will enter into a new successful love relationship, God willing. Pink roses in a dream indicate a state of stability and psychological calm that the dreamer enjoys The dreamer in his normal life environment. Interpretation of a dream about seeing cloves in a dream. Interpretation of the growth of roses in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl who plants roses in her dream will be able to achieve many achievements and successes in her current work. Also, the growth of roses for a single girl indicates the performance of duties and obedience and preventing her from practicing immorality and sins. If the dreamer is a student, planting roses in her dream predicts that she will get excellent grades this year as a result of her pursuit of excellence. Interpretation of a dream about seeing adultery in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ak

title: Interpretation of a dream about bombing a warplane in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about bombing a warplane in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Sometimes dreams can be somewhat strange and complex, unlike the human mind, such as a dream about airplanes, and people may think that this dream is interpreted as frightening, confusing, and frightening, but it contradicts what many believe. About seeing airplanes in a dream. Airplanes are a symbol of the dreamer’s dreams in life. Interpretation of a dream of bombing a warplane in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of bombing a warplane in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing airplanes in a dream means freedom or liberation, and in general the dream of an airplane is associated with success and status, And also by the fact that the dreamer is ready to overcome all obstacles and reach. New horizons. Interpretation of a dream about bombing a warplane in a dream by Ibn Sirin: A dream about bombing a warplane in a dream indicates an achievement in the professional arena. But this success depends on the way the plane goes during the flight, and you will be very successful if the plane goes well. While If the plane's path is not good, this is a sign of the dreamer's social and psychological instability and he must search within himself for better development. If you see a warplane taking off and exploding in a dream, this means that you will face difficult times in your life, especially in financial matters, or you will face difficulties in The ability to continue the project you are developing, but this will not happen. be for a long time. Being. See also: I dreamed that I was breastfeeding a child while I was single.. Interpretation of dreams about breastfeeding a child in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about bombing a warplane for a married woman. The dream of an airplane is one of the common dreams in people’s lives, and the dream of traveling by plane predicts radical changes in the dreamer’s life, and the dream explains that this change is internal. It has no importance to the outside world. Serena: A married woman’s dream of a warplane being bombed indicates a radical change in her life and that this change will be for the better and a new beginning for the married woman. If a married woman dreams of a warplane being bombed, the dream indicates that she will open the horizon and indicates new scenarios in the married woman’s life. Landing a warplane in the life of a married woman indicates a great opportunity to end the difficulties and obstacles in the life of a married woman and win in life, so you should not be discouraged until you achieve all dreams. The interpretation of a dream about flying with family for a married woman indicates that she will meet new people in married life and they will be They are indispensable in her life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about driving a car for a single woman according to Ibn Sirin in detail. Interpretation of a dream about planes bombing missiles. Flying in the air indicates success and the fulfillment of dreams as well as achieving goals, and when it comes to seeing missiles from a warplane flying in a dream, this dream indicates that something What will happen will lead to a collapse or obstacles in the dreamer’s life that will prevent him from achieving his goals, and below we present to you more meanings of the interpretation of a dream about a warplane launching missiles in a dream: The dream indicates the bombing of aircraft.

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of leprosy in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a leprosy in a dream: A gecko or gecko is a reptile that is characterized by its small size, long tail, large head, and prominent eyes, in addition to belonging to the family of marsupials and marsupials. Interpretation of a dream about leprosy by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin confirms that leprosy in a dream means hypocrisy and gossip, and it also indicates the presence of an evil person. In the life of the dreamer. Whoever sees in his dream that he is embracing a leper without fear or panic, this means that the dreamer is one who refrains from telling the truth and loves to harm others. If the dreamer sees in a dream that leprosy has bitten his hand, this is evidence of the presence of a fierce enemy in the dreamer’s life. Able to possess him and harm him. If a single person sees in his dream that a leper follows him wherever he goes, this means that in the coming period he will suffer from great injustice and this injustice will affect him and his psyche. If a person dreams of a leper in his money bag, this means that this man will lose a lot of money. Money in the coming days or he will be exposed to a major theft attempt. When a single person sees in a dream someone he knows, and suddenly that person turns into a leper, this means that that person is stealing the dreamer’s effort and returning it to him, and it also indicates that the dreamer will fall victim to a major deception and fraud by someone His close friends. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he has been imprisoned with leprosy, this is evidence that he will overcome all the difficulties he went through, and the door of anxiety and distress will soon be closed. Killing a leper in a dream For a married woman to see in her dream that she is killing a leper who entered her house, this means That she will overcome difficulties and endure the harm of everyone who intends to destroy her home and destroy the relationship between her and her husband. When an unmarried woman sees that she was able to kill lepers in her dream despite the strong feelings of fear that controlled her in the dream, this vision is good news from God that the unmarried woman will be able to overcome For all her fears and problems. In her life, she will live a safe life without fear or anxiety. If a married woman sees that one of her children has killed a leper in a dream, this means that this child will be courageous and will tell the truth no matter the cost. Google the Egyptian dream interpretation website and you will find all the dream interpretations you are looking for. Interpretation Leprosy in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that a leper sleeps in his food, this is evidence that the dreamer’s money is forbidden. If the dreamer sees that he killed the leper with his own hand, this indicates that the dreamer has a great degree of wisdom and closeness to God. If the dreamer dreams of several lepers standing On the wall of his house, this means that there are many of the dreamer’s relatives who are gossiping about him and speaking ill of him. If a single woman sees her fiancé in a dream standing on his shoulder suffering from leprosy, this means that there is someone trying to spoil the relationship between you. If an unmarried woman sees that she is capable To kill people with leprosy with the help of someone she knows, this means that she will confront her enemies with the help of this person and defeat them and defeat them with a crushing defeat. Seeing leprosy in a dream indicates that the dreamer is immersed in sin and has done what God has forbidden. If the dreamer sees that he
